title: Enhancing Systems Design Practical Skills: TPACK-Based Technology Integration Design for Music Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the integrated design principles of music-technology-pedagogy by applying the TPACK framework.
Learners can analyze and reconstruct emotional expression elements in musical works using VR/simulation tools.
Learners can create small-scale compositions using digital music production tools and receive peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
